review: Doctor has guided me with best treatment.very calm attitude and she patiently answer all my queries and provided a positive approach.

My name is Viviana. I visited Dr Sharda for my aunt's surgery. I was beyond impressed by how helpful and kind Dr Sharda was, with a cheerful smile, and made us feel comfortable. She has provided the absolute best care and the best advice and treatment during every visit. Honestly, it is such a wonderful thing to have a doctor who cares is compassionate and kind. I would highly recommend Dr Sharda and would rate a 5 star for her excellence and dedication towards her work. Thank You!
